arabicText: وَٱتَّقُوا۟ فِتْنَةًۭ لَّا تُصِيبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مِنكُمْ خَآصَّةًۭ ۖ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ
englishTranslationText:
And	fear the	turmoil	which	will	certainly	not	fall	only	upon	a	few	selected	unjust	people	among	
you;	and	know	that	Allah’s	punishment	is	severe.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	us	fitne	se	darte	raho	jo	hargiz	tum	meiñ	khās Ƶālimoñ	ko	hi	na	pahuñche	ga	aur	jān	lo	ke	
Allah	k	‘azāb	sakht	hai.

arabicText: وَٱذْكُرُوٓا۟ إِذْ أَنتُمْ قَلِيلٌۭ مُّسْتَضْعَفُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ تَخَافُونَ أَن يَتَخَطَّفَكُمُ ٱلنَّاسُ فَـَٔاوَىٰكُمْ وَأَيَّدَكُم بِنَصْرِهِۦ وَرَزَقَكُم مِّنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	remember	when	you	were	only	a	few	
and	meek	in	the	land,	and	feared	that	men	
may	snatch	you	away	- He	therefore	gave	
you	refuge	and	strengthened	you	with	His	
help,	 and	 gave	 you	 good	 things	 as	
sustenance,	so	that	you	may	be	thankful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 yād	 karo	 jab	 tum	 thode	 they	 mulk	
meiñ	 dabe	 huwe	 darte	 they	 ke	 kahiñ	 log	
tumheiñ	 uchak	 na le	 jāyeñ	 to	 us	 ne	
tumheiñ	 jagah	 di	 aur	 apni	 madad	 se	 zor	
diya	aur	suthri	cheezeiñ	tumheiñ	rozi	deiñ	
ke	kahiñ	tum	ehsān	māno.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَخُونُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلرَّسُولَ وَتَخُونُوٓا۟ أَمَـٰنَـٰتِكُمْ وَأَنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Do	not	betray	Allah
and	 His	 Noble	 Messenger,	 nor	 purposely	
defraud	your	trusts.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo' Allah	aur	Rasool	se	dagha	
na	 karo	 aur	 na	 apni	 amanatoñ	 meiñ	
dānista	khiyānat

arabicText: وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّمَآ أَمْوَٰلُكُمْ وَأَوْلَـٰدُكُمْ فِتْنَةٌۭ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	 know	 that	 your	 wealth	 and	 your	
children	are	a	test,	and	that	with	Allah is	an	
immense	reward.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jān	rakho	ke	tumhāre	māl	aur	tumhāri	
aulād	 sab	 fitna	 hai	aur	Allah	 ke	 pās	 bada	
sawāb	hai

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِن تَتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّكُمْ فُرْقَانًۭا وَيُكَفِّرْ عَنكُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتِكُمْ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلْفَضْلِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	If	you	fear	Allah,	He	
will	 bestow	 upon	 you	(the	 criterion)	that	
with	 which	 you	 will	 separate	 the	 truth	
from	falsehood,	and	He	will	unburden	your	
misdeeds	and	forgive	you;	and	Allah is	the	
Extremely	Munificent.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Imān	 wālo' agar	 Allah	 se	 daro	 ge	 to	
tumheiñ	 woh	 dega	 jis	 se	 haq	 ko	 bātil	 se	
juda	karlo	aur	tumhāri	buraiyān	utār	dega	
aur	 tumheiñ	 bakhsh	 dega	 aur	 Allah	 bade	
fazl	wāla	hai

arabicText: وَإِذْ يَمْكُرُ بِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِيُثْبِتُوكَ أَوْ يَقْتُلُوكَ أَوْ يُخْرِجُوكَ ۚ وَيَمْكُرُونَ وَيَمْكُرُ ٱللَّهُ ۖ وَٱللَّهُ خَيْرُ ٱلْمَـٰكِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 remember	O	 dear	 Prophet	when	 the	
disbelievers	were	scheming	against	you	to	
either	 imprison	 you,	 or	 to	 kill	 you	 or	 to	
banish	you;	and	they	were	scheming,	and	
Allah was	 making	 His	 secret	 plan;	 and	
Allah’s	secret	plan	is	the	best.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 aey	 Mehboob! Yād	 karo	 jab	 kāfir	
tumhāre	sāth	makr	karte	they	ke	tumheiñ	
band	(Qaid)	karleñ	ya	shaheed	kardeñ	ya	
nikāl	(Jalā	Watan	kar)	deñ	aur	woh	apna	sa	
makr	 karte	 they	 aur	 Allah	 apni	 khufya	
tadbeer	farmāta	tha	aur	Allah	ki	khufya	tadbeer	sab	se	behtar

arabicText: وَإِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُنَا قَالُوا۟ قَدْ سَمِعْنَا لَوْ نَشَآءُ لَقُلْنَا مِثْلَ هَـٰذَآ ۙ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	Our	verses	are	recited	to	them	
they	say,	“Yes,	we	have	heard	- if	we	wanted	we	could	also	say	something	like	this	- these	are	
nothing	but	stories	of	former	people!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur jab	un	par	hamāri	āayateiñ	padhi	jāyeñ	to	kehte	haiñ	hāñ	hum	ne	suna	hum	chāhte	to	aisi	
hum	bhi	keh	dete	yeh	to	nahi	magar	agloñ	ke	qisse

arabicText: وَإِذْ قَالُوا۟ ٱللَّهُمَّ إِن كَانَ هَـٰذَا هُوَ ٱلْحَقَّ مِنْ عِندِكَ فَأَمْطِرْ عَلَيْنَا حِجَارَةًۭ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَوِ ٱئْتِنَا بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	they	said,	“O	Allah!	If	this	(the	Qur’an)	is	really	the	truth	from	You,	then	shower	upon	
us	a	rain	of	stones	from	the	sky,	or	bring	upon	us	some	painful	punishment.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	bole	ke	aey	Allah' agar	yehi	(Qur'an)	teri	taraf	se	haq	hai	to	hum	par	āasmān	se	patthar	
barsa	ya	koi	dard-nāk	‘aƶāb		hum	par	la	.

arabicText: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعَذِّبَهُمْ وَأَنتَ فِيهِمْ ۚ وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ مُعَذِّبَهُمْ وَهُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	it	is	not	for	Allah to	punish	them	while	you	O	dear	Prophet	(Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	
be	 upon	 him)	 are	 amongst	 them;	 and	Allah will	 not	 punish	 them	 as	long	 as	 they	 are	 seeking	
forgiveness.	(Prophet	Muhammad – peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him	– is	a	mercy	unto	mankind.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	ka	kām	nahi	ke	unheiñ		‘aƶāb		kare	jab	tak	aey	Mehboob' tum	un	meiñ	tashreef	farma	
ho	aur	Allah	unheiñ		‘aƶāb		karne	wāla	nahi	jab	tak	woh	bakhshish	māñg	rahe	haiñ

arabicText: وَمَا لَهُمْ أَلَّا يُعَذِّبَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَهُمْ يَصُدُّونَ عَنِ ٱلْمَسْجِدِ ٱلْحَرَامِ وَمَا كَانُوٓا۟ أَوْلِيَآءَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنْ أَوْلِيَآؤُهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 what	is	 with	 them	 that	Allah should	
not	 punish	 them,	 whereas	 in	 fact	 they	
prevent	 from	 the	Sacred	Masjid and	 they	
are	not	worthy	(of	being	the	custodians)	of	
it;	 only	 the	 pious	 are	 its	 befitting	
custodians,	but	most	of	them	do	not	have	
knowledge.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	unheiñ		kya	hai	ke	Allah	unheiñ	‘aƶāb		
na	kare	woh	to	Masjid-e	Harām	se	rok	rahe	
haiñ	aur	woh	iske	ahel	nahi	uske	auliya	to	
parhez	gār	hi	haiñ	magar	un	meiñ	aksar	ko	
ilm	nahi.

arabicText: وَمَا كَانَ صَلَاتُهُمْ عِندَ ٱلْبَيْتِ إِلَّا مُكَآءًۭ وَتَصْدِيَةًۭ ۚ فَذُوقُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 their	 prayer	 near	 the	 Kaa’bah	 is	
nothing	except	whistling	and	clapping;	“So	
now	 taste	 the	 punishment	- the	 result	 of	
your	disbelief.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 kāba	 ke	 pās	 unki	 namāz	 nahi	 magar	
seeti	aur	tāli	to	ab	‘aƶāb		chakho	badla	apne	
kufr	ka

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُنفِقُونَ أَمْوَٰلَهُمْ لِيَصُدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ فَسَيُنفِقُونَهَا ثُمَّ تَكُونُ عَلَيْهِمْ حَسْرَةًۭ ثُمَّ يُغْلَبُونَ ۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ يُحْشَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	the	disbelievers	spend	their	wealth	
in	order	to	prevent	people	from	the	way	of	
Allah;	so	they	will	spend	it	now,	and	then	
regret	over	it,	 then	 they	will	be	defeated;	
and	 the	 disbelievers	 will	 be	 gathered	
towards	hell.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	kāfir	apne	māl	kharch	karte	haiñ	
ke	 Allah	 ki	 rāh	 se	 rokeñ	 to	 ab	 unheiñ		
kharch	 kareñge	 phir	 woh	 un	 par	
pachhtāwa	hoñge	phir	maghloob	kar	diye	
jāyeñge	aur	kāfiroñ		ka	hashr	jahannam	ki	
taraf	hoga	.

arabicText: إِلِيَمِيزَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْخَبِيثَ مِنَ ٱلطَّيِّبِ وَيَجْعَلَ ٱلْخَبِيثَ بَعْضَهُۥ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ فَيَرْكُمَهُۥ جَمِيعًۭا فَيَجْعَلَهُۥ فِى جَهَنَّمَ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
In	order	that	Allah may	separate	the	filthy	
from	 the	pure,	and	placing	 the	 filthy	atop	
one	another,	make	a	heap	and	throw	them	
into	hell;	it	is	they	who	are	the	losers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Is	 liye	 ke	 Allah	 gande	 ko	 suthre	 se	 juda	
farma	de	aur	najasatoñ	ko	 tale	upar	rakh	
kar	 sab	 ek	 dher	 banākar	 jahannam	 meiñ	
dāl	de	wohi	nuqsān	pāne	wāle	haiñ

arabicText: قُل لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِن يَنتَهُوا۟ يُغْفَرْ لَهُم مَّا قَدْ سَلَفَ وَإِن يَعُودُوا۟ فَقَدْ مَضَتْ سُنَّتُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Say	 to	 the	disbelievers	 that	if	 they	desist,	
what	has	passed	will	be	forgiven	to	them;	
and	 if	 they	 do	 the	 same,	 the	 tradition	 of	
former	people	has	already	passed.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	kāfiroñ		se	farmāo		agar	woh	b’az	rahe	to	jo	ho	guzra	woh	unheiñ		mu'āf	farma	diya	jāyega	
aur	agar	phir	wohi	kareiñ		to	agloñ	ka	dastoor	guzar	chuka	hai

arabicText: وَقَـٰتِلُوهُمْ حَتَّىٰ لَا تَكُونَ فِتْنَةٌۭ وَيَكُونَ ٱلدِّينُ كُلُّهُۥ لِلَّهِ ۚ فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوْا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا يَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	 fight	them	until	no	mischief	remains	and	the	entire	religion	is	only	 for	Allah;	then	if	they	
desist,	Allah sees	all	what	they	do.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	un	se	lado	yahāñ		tak	ke	koi	fasād	bāqi	na	rahe	aur	sāra	deen	Allah	hi	ka	ho	jāye	phir	
agar	woh	b’az	raheñ	to	Allah	unke	kām	dekh	raha	hai	.

arabicText: وَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوْلَىٰكُمْ ۚ نِعْمَ ٱلْمَوْلَىٰ وَنِعْمَ ٱلنَّصِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	they	turn	away,	then	know	that	Allah is	your	Master;	so	what	an	Excellent	Master	and	what	
an	Excellent	Supporter!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	woh	phireñ	to	jān	lo	ke	Allah	tumhāra	Maula	hai	to	kya	hi	achchha	Maula	aur	kya	hi	
achchha	madad-gār!
